reviewText: I vaguely remember Cro from my childhood, along with Back to the future and Bill and Ted's excellent adventures. Finally, last year, I saw the intro and the first episode on Youtube. For quite a while, I've been harvesting for the sake of entertaining and educating my brother's kids, and this is exactly the kind of thing I've been looking for!
I haven't purchased this but I do remember the show from when I was little. I loved that show. This is a classic, for you or your kids.
